query: WITH entities AS (SELECT customer_id, id FROM credit_facilities WHERE ((customer_id = ANY($1)) AND (COALESCE(id < $3, true))) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: CreditFacilityId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN credit_facility_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
